extendedInfo.description: Y Still using the lock button to lock the screen..Install And have a fun In locking the scree...The people are asking change so install this app ...Features:-* Super App for professions and students.* Lock button not working then istall this app.* Shake the mobile to predetermined length to lock the screen.* Sensitivity can be controlled by You.* A super UI.* A 4.2 Jelly Bean Switch is Implemented.Rate it..If u Have any bugs please mail me before giving comment .. i'll fix it for You.## Cannot uninstall this app?1. Open âSettingsâ in Home;2. Select âLocation ï¼ Security -> Select device administratorsâ;3. Unchecked permission of Shake to lock ;4. REMOVE Shake to lock normally;

reviews.title: Works but...
reviews.comment: It needs to run as background or it\'ll be useless.  Not really useful. 4 stars because it functions.
reviews.author: Quek Junming

reviews.title: Excellent BUT
reviews.comment: It was good but I uninstalled it because it won\'t let you change the sensitivity.. Although it does have a sensitivity option it doesn\'t work.. Great job though
